role.name: midPoint:endUser
role.description: Role authorizing end users to log in, change their passwords and review assigned accounts. Note: This role definition is just an example. It should be tailored for each specific deployment.

authorization.name: gui-self-service-access
authorization.description: Allow access to all self-service operations in GUI.

authorization.name: self-read
authorization.description: Allow to read all the properties of "self" object. I.e. every logged-in user can read object that represent his own identity.

authorization.name: self-shadow-read
authorization.description: Allow to read all the properties of all the shadows that belong to "self" object. I.e. every logged-in user can read all his accounts.

authorization.name: self-persona-read
authorization.description: Allow to read all the personas of currently logged-in user.

authorization.name: self-credentials-request
authorization.description: Allow to modify user's own credentials. Note that this is a request phase authorization. It also requires corresponding execution-phase authorization.

authorization.name: self-shadow-credentials-request
authorization.description: Allow to modify credentials of all users accounts. Note that this is a request phase authorization. It also requires corresponding execution-phase authorization.

authorization.name: read-requestable-roles
authorization.description: Allow to read requestable roles. This allows to search for requestable roles in user interface.

authorization.name: requestable-role-details
authorization.description: Allow to show details of requestable roles in the user interface.

authorization.name: assign-requestable-roles
authorization.description: Allow to assign requestable roles. This allows to request roles in a request-and-approve process. The requestable roles will be displayed in the role request dialog by default. Please note that the roles also need an approval definition to go through the approval process. Otherwise they will be assigned automatically without any approval.

authorization.name: self-execution-modify
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to self-modification of some properties, but only in execution phase. The limitation real limitation of these operations is done in the request phase. E.g. the modification of assignments is controlled in the request phase by using the #assign authorization.

authorization.name: self-shadow-execution-add-modify-delete
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to self-modification of user's accounts, but only in execution phase. The real limitation of these operations is done in the request phase.

authorization.name: assignment-target-get
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to read all the object that are possible assignment targets. We want that to display the targets in the selection windows. Note that this authorization may be too broad for production use. Normally it should be limited to just selected properties such as name and description.

authorization.name: operational-objects-get
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to read all the object that are possible to use for (not only) GUI customizations. E.g there might be lookup tables used for attributes, custom form types defined, etc.

authorization.name: assignment-target-read-case
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to read approval status of cases. This is used to display requests to the end users, especially in the "My Requests" box in user dashboard.

authorization.name: self-owned-task-read
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to see all tasks owned by a currently logged-in user.

authorization.name: self-assigned-role-read
authorization.description: Authorization that allows to see all roles assigned by a currently logged-in user.

role.name: midPoint:approver
role.description: Role authorizing users to make approval decisions on work items.

authorization.name: gui-approver-access
authorization.description: Allow access to list of work items in GUI. Allow access to pages that show object details, so the approver may examine who is requesting and what is requesting.

authorization.name: workitems-delegate
authorization.description: Allow delegation of own work items.

authorization.name: cases-read
authorization.description: Allow to see the requester of the operation that is being approved and the current delta. In order for the approver to see other properties (e.g. history of the approvals) please allow read access to other items as well.

authorization.name: users-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic user properties to be able to display requestor details in the approval forms.

authorization.name: roles-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic role properties to be able to display details of the requested role.

authorization.name: orgs-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic org properties to be able to display details of the requested org.

authorization.name: services-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic service properties to be able to display details of the requested service.

role.name: Metarole: Approval by Council of Patrons
role.description: Role assigned to this metarole will require approval by any member of Council of Patrons organization in order to be assigned to user.

role.name: Metarole: Approval by Manager
role.description: Role assigned to this metarole will require approval by user's manager (if any) in order to be assigned.

role.name: patron
role.description: A role for art patrons. Designed to be assigned manually and approved in the workflow.

role.name: Philistine
role.description: A role for philistines (people who are hostile or indifferent to culture and the arts). A person can't be a philistine and patron at the same time.

authorization.name: remove-self
authorization.description: Allow user to remove himself from this role. This is important for conflict solver in role request process when the user wants to request role which has a segregation of duties with this role.

role.name: LDAP Projects MetaRole
role.description: using to push new Projects to LDAP automatically

role.name: contractor
role.description: Role that gives contractors necessary access.

role.name: full time employee
role.description: Basic role for full-time employee. It contains basic access rights that every employee should get automatically.

inducement.description: LDAP resource with implied group membership

role.name: LDAP Orgs MetaRole
role.description: using to push new Orgs to LDAP automatically

role.name: midPoint:delegator
role.description: Role authorizing users to delegate their own privileges to any other user.

authorization.name: gui-delegator-access
authorization.description: Allow access to the delegate functionality (e.g. "add delegation" button).

authorization.name: delegator-exec-user
authorization.description: Quite strong universal execution rights are needed here. We are going to modify other users (deputy assignments are in the delegate user, not delegator).

authorization.name: delegator-exec-shadow
authorization.description: Quite strong universal execution rights are needed here. We are going to modify other users (deputy assignments are in the delegate user, not delegator). Modification of other users may mean also creation/modification/deletion of their accounts.

authorization.name: delegator-read-delagate-assignments
authorization.description: Authorization to read the assignments and assignment-related items from my delegates. This authorization is necessary so the self-service GUI can properly display user's delegations. Delegations are in fact assignments in the delegate object, not delegator object. Therefore authorization to read just "self" will not display the delegations.

role.name: midPoint:reviewer
role.description: Role authorizing users to make decisions on certification cases.

authorization.name: gui-reviewer-access
authorization.description: Allow access to list of certification cases in GUI. Allow access to pages that show object details, so the reviewer may examine data related to the request.

authorization.name: users-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic user properties.

authorization.name: roles-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic role properties.

authorization.name: orgs-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic org properties.

authorization.name: services-read
authorization.description: Allow to read basic service properties.

role.name: midPoint:superuser
role.description: Role that gives user full authorization in MidPoint.
